about_the_game:
Embark on a grand adventure in a land steeped in legend and magic. Join forces with other players to reclaim your rightful place among the heroes of old!

Experience top-tier AAA gaming right at your fingertips. Dive into a world of dragons and legends with just a tap. Whether you play for minutes or hours, The Dragon Odyssey offers an unforgettable adventure.

Go solo or team up with friends to defeat colossal foes! Battle swarms of enemies or engage in epic player-vs-player clashes to prove your valor! Explore a vast and enchanting world!

SHAPE YOUR DESTINY

Create your ultimate hero and embark on an epic journey

• Customize your look, equipment, and combat style

• Choose from five unique classes – Warrior, Mage, Gunner, Assassin, and Priest

• Select from six different races – Human, Ogre, Elf, Dwarf, Fairy and Succubus

• RPG-style character creation

• Unlock new abilities with every victorious battle

• Upgrade your weapons and armor

• Seek out hidden treasures and legendary items

• Craft your own legendary gear

DYNAMIC, FAST-PACED RPG COMBAT

Console-quality graphics and gameplay in the palm of your hand

• Intuitive controls put you at the heart of the action

• Always feel in control, whether battling in dungeons or exploring the wilderness

• Simple directional controls for easy hero movement

• Unleash powerful attacks with a single tap

• Cross-platform play lets you continue your adventure on PC or mobile

• ARPG hack-and-slash excitement

• Dungeon-crawling action

EXPLORE A MAGICAL WORLD

A vast and mysterious world awaits you!

• Journey through diverse landscapes like the ancient city and the mystical Forest

• Encounter evolving challenges and changing environments

• Immerse yourself in a rich storyline filled with quests, bosses, and adventures

• Engage in raids within massive, ever-changing dungeons

• Frequent updates ensure there's always something new to discover

• A fantasy RPG adventure

A MASSIVELY MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE

Endless opportunities to connect and collaborate with fellow adventurers!

• Friends who quest together, stay together

• MMORPG-style gameplay

• Team up for dungeon raids

• Compete against other players to prove your strength

• Trade gear to help each other advance

No matter your playstyle, The Dragon Odyssey delivers a rich ARPG and MMORPG experience. Download now and begin your legendary adventure!

name: The Dragon Odyssey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit SP1 or higher
  • Processor: Inter Core i3 gen8/ i5 gen7/ i7 gen4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i7 gen10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: Embark on an epic adventure in The Dragon Odyssey! Customize your hero and battle in dynamic ARPG combat. Explore vast worlds, raid dungeons, and uncover treasures. Play solo or team up in thrilling MMORPG gameplay. Begin your legendary journey today!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
